Package.Name: alsa-plugins
Package.Summary: The Advanced Linux Sound Architecture (ALSA) plugins.
Package.Description: alsa-plugins provides plugins like JACK, PulseAudio, etc. for ALSA.
alsa-plugins ALSA mimarisinin JACK, PulseAudio, vb. gibi altyapılar ile çalışmasını sağlayan eklentiler içerir.

Package.Name: celestia
Package.Description: Celestia is a space simulation software that lets you explore our universe in three dimensions.
Celestia, evreni üç boyutlu olarak keşfetmenizi sağlayan özgür bir uzay simulasyonu uygulamasıdır.

Package.Name: cponysay
Package.Summary: A basic C implementation of Ponysay.
Package.Description: A basic C implementation of Ponysay.

Package.Name: gtkhash-plugin-schema
Package.Summary: A cross-platform desktop utility for computing message digests or checksums.
Package.Description: GtkHash is a desktop utility for computing message digests or checksums. Most well-known hash functions are supported, including MD5, SHA1, SHA2 (SHA256/SHA512), SHA3 and BLAKE2.

Package.Name: gtkhash
Package.Summary: A cross-platform desktop utility for computing message digests or checksums.
Package.Description: GtkHash is a desktop utility for computing message digests or checksums. Most well-known hash functions are supported, including MD5, SHA1, SHA2 (SHA256/SHA512), SHA3 and BLAKE2.

Package.Name: lwa-hot-corners
Package.Description: Pretty simple hot corners implementation for X server written in modern C++.

Package.Name: lxappearance
Package.Summary: A new feature-rich GTK+ theme switcher.
Package.Description: LXAppearance is a new GTK+ theme switcher developed for project LXDE.

Package.Name: lxterminal
Package.Description: Lxterminal is a Lightweight vte-based tabbed terminal emulator for LXDE.

Package.Name: lxsession
Package.Description: lxsession is the default X11 session manager of LXDE.

Package.Name: lxrandr
Package.Summary: LXDE GUI interface to RandR extention.
Package.Description: lxrandr is a LXDE GUI interface to RandR extention.

Package.Name: lxinput
Package.Summary: LXDE keyboard and mouse configuration tool.
Package.Description: lxinput is tool for LXDE keyboard and mouse configuration.

Package.Name: lxtask
Package.Description: Lxtask is a lightweight and desktop independent task manager.

Package.Name: lxde-common
Package.Description: lxde-common provides LXDE Session default configuration files and nuoveXT2 iconset.

Package.Name: lxpanel
Package.Summary: Lightweight X11 desktop panel for LXDE.
Package.Description: lxpanel is a lightweight X11 desktop panel for LXDE.

Package.Name: liferea
Package.Description: Liferea (abbreviation of Linux Feed Reader) is a news aggreagator for RSS/RDF feeds which also supports CDF channels, Atom/Echo/PIE feeds and OCS or OPML directories. It is a simple FeedReader clone for Unix.

Liferea (Linux Feed Reader'in kısaltması), RSS/RDF beslemelerini okumak için yazılmış ve aynı zamanda CDF kanallarını destekleyen haber okuyucudur. Atom/Echo/PIE beslemelerini ve OCS veya OPML dizinlerini ayrıca desteklemektedir. Unix için yazılmış basit bir FeedReader benzeri uygulamadır.

Package.Name: lxmenu-data
Package.Description: lxmenu-data provides files needed for LXDE application menus.

Package.Name: libb2
Package.Summary: C library providing BLAKE2b, BLAKE2s, BLAKE2bp, BLAKE2sp.
Package.Description: C library providing BLAKE2b, BLAKE2s, BLAKE2bp, BLAKE2sp.

Package.Name: libfm
Package.Description: libfm is a LXDE library for file management.

Package.Name: libxdg-basedir
Package.Summary: libxdg-basedir is an implementation of the XDG Base Directory specifications.
Package.Description: libxdg-basedir is an implementation of the XDG Base Directory specifications.

Package.Name: modem-manager-gui
Package.Summary: Modem Manager GUI is a simple GTK based graphical interface.
Package.Description: Modem Manager GUI is a simple GTK based graphical interface compatible with Modem manager, Wader and oFono system services able to control EDGE/3G/4G broadband modem specific functions. You can check balance of your SIM card, send or receive SMS messages, control mobile traffic consuption and more using Modem Manager GUI.

Package.Name: mpd-notification
Package.Description: This little program creates a notification everytime mpd plays a track.

Package.Name: milton
Package.Description: Milton is an open source application that lets you Just Paint. There are no pixels, you can paint with (almost) infinite detail. It feels raster-based but it works with vectors. It is not an image editor. It is not a vector graphics editor. It is a program that lets you draw, sketch and paint. There is no save button, your work is persistent with unlimited undo.

Package.Name: openbox-menu
Package.Summary: Openbox-menu is a pipemenu for Openbox window manager.
Package.Description: Openbox-menu is a pipemenu for Openbox window manager. It provides a dynamic menu listing installed applications. Most of the work is done by the LXDE library menu-cache.

Package.Name: obkey
Package.Description: ObKey - Openbox Key Editor (PyGObject version).

Package.Name: obconf
Package.Description: Openbox Configuration Manager.

Package.Name: puddletag
Package.Summary: Puddletag is an audio tag editor (primarily created) for GNU/Linux.
Package.Description: Supported formats: ID3v1, ID3v2 (mp3), MP4 (mp4, m4a, etc.), VorbisComments (ogg, flac), Musepack (mpc), Monkey’s Audio (.ape) and WavPack (wv).

Package.Name: pcmanfm
Package.Description: PCMan File Manager is an extremly fast and lightweight file manager for LXDE.

Package.Name: pybookreader
Package.Description: PyBookReader is a Book Reader for Linux/FreeBSD/other operation systems.

Package.Name: picom
Package.Description: This is forked from the original Compton because it seems to have become unmaintained.

Package.Name: qtstyleplugins
Package.Description: Additional style plugins for Qt.

Package.Name: qt5ct
Package.Description: This program allows users to configure Qt5 settings (theme, font, icons, etc.) under DE/WM without Qt integration.

Package.Name: radiotray-ng
Package.Summary: Radiotray-NG: An Internet radio player for Linux.
Package.Description: It became clear as one of the early contributors to the RadioTray project that it was not getting the attention it required and was probably dead. A lot of the technologies it used had moved on to newer versions and the bugs started piling up. I did my best to help users, but a new start was required.

Package.Name: simple-fb2-reader
Package.Summary: Simple FB2 book reader on GTK+3
Package.Description: Simple tool to read FB2 books. Developed using GTK+3.

Package.Name: transcode
Package.Summary: Converter tool for several video and audio formats
Çeşitli görüntü ve ses kodlayıcıları için dönüştürme araçları
Package.Description: Transcode is a suite of command line utilities for transcoding video and audio codecs, and for converting beween different container formats. Transcode can decode, encode and convert many audio and video formats into one another.

Transcode, video ve ses dosyalarını değişik içerik formatlarına dönüştürmek için kullanılabilecek komut satırı araçları paketidir. Transcode MPEG-1/2, MPEG-4, DivX ve XviD, Quicktime/MPEG-PS, MPEG-1-layer-1/2/3 audio, AC3 gibi birçok ses ve görüntü formatını birbirine çevirebilir.

Package.Name: thunar-gtkhash-plugin
Package.Summary: A cross-platform desktop utility for computing message digests or checksums.
Package.Description: GtkHash is a desktop utility for computing message digests or checksums. Most well-known hash functions are supported, including MD5, SHA1, SHA2 (SHA256/SHA512), SHA3 and BLAKE2.

Package.Name: uthash
Package.Summary: A hash table for C structures.
Package.Description: Any C structure can be stored in a hash table using uthash. Just add a UT_hash_handle to the structure and choose one or more fields in your structure to act as the key. Then use these macros to store, retrieve or delete items from the hash table.
